title: speech
comment: The human capacity to express oneself and communicate with others through the spoken word. God addresses humans through the spoken word, and supremely in and through Jesus Christ.

children.title: speech, power and significance of
children.comment: A person's speech has an enormous influence for good or ill and is a sure guide to character.

children.title: It has the power of life and death
It can bring ruin or joy to the speaker
It can bring life to others
There is an appropriate time for speaking
There is an appropriate time for silence
Jesus Christ was silent before his accusers
Speech is an expression of a person's character
speech, divine
children.comment: Scripture assumes and affirms that God has spoken to many different people throughout the ages in a variety of ways.

children.title: Speech as a synonym for revelation

seealsos.comment: God's voice is depicted as thunder, the most awesome sound in nature

children.title: God's word is recognised and loved by his people
God's word is supremely revealed in Jesus Christ
speech, positive aspects of
children.comment: The way in which believers speak should reflect their calling as Christians. Christian speech should be sincere, godly and honouring to God.

children.title: Characteristics of godly speech in relation to God
It gives thanks and praise to God
It confesses Jesus Christ as Lord
Characteristics of godly speech in relation to others
It is gentle, gracious and tactful
It will speak of God and his works
Jesus Christ's speech was perfect and unique
Speech as a means of blessing people
speech, negative aspects of
children.comment: The sinfulness of fallen human nature can express itself in speech, provoking God's displeasure and causing enmity and division amongst people.

children.title: Evil speech comes from a corrupt heart
Evil speech is a feature of a corrupt society
